name: Hidden Cats In Town
description:
Find the hidden cute cats in the relaxing hand-painted town scenery.
There are many cats here.
Meow Meow···Meow Meow···
Stay with the cats. Don't miss any one.



· Hand-painted minimalist style
· More than 500 cats
· With different postures and expressions
· Explore the small town, from street to roof top
· Some interesting interactive elements
· Drag and zoom the screen view
· Relax and find all the cats
